name: Testing commands needed in a function
author: Alberto Rafael Rodriguez Iglesias <albertocysec@gmail.com>
description: This module will be applied on a session connected to a shell. It will check which commands are available in the system.

options.name: WORKSPACE
options.description: Specify the workspace for this module

options.name: SESSION
options.description: The session to run this module on.

options.name: DIR
options.description: Optional directory name to list, default current session path
